explicit.graphviz

Class ShowRewardDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • explicit.graphviz.ShowRewardDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decorator

    public class ShowRewardDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decorator
    A decorator that attaches rewards to the labels of nodes / edges, according to the given reward structure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Rewards rewards
      The reward structure
      private boolean showZero
      Flag: should zero rewards be output?
